org.lcsim.detector.tracker.silicon

Class SiStriplets

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.detector.tracker.silicon.SiPixels
      • org.lcsim.detector.tracker.silicon.SiStriplets
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SiSensorElectrodes

    public class SiStriplets
extends SiPixels
    Class describing striplet electrodes of a silicon sensor. This class extends SiPixels but overrides the calculation of the strip ID and provides methods needed to create 1D strip hits.

    • Method Detail

      • getCellID

        public int getCellID(int row,
                     int column)
        Informations: NOTE:: cellID in this class IS NOT the RawHitTracker getCellID() In this class, CellID is the strip number. For example the strip number of and hit associated to a *sensor* can be retrieved from a RawTrackerHit by using the decoder. See Snippet below Imports needed: import org.lcsim.detector.tracker.silicon.SiTrackerIdentifierHelper; Snippet: SiTrackerIdentifierHelper _sid_helper = (SiTrackerIdentifierHelper) sensor.getIdentifierHelper(); int strip = _sid_helper.getElectrodeValue(hit.getIdentifier()); Then strip can be used as cellID in this class to get row/columns/position
        Specified by:
        getCellID in interface SiSensorElectrodes
        Overrides:
        getCellID in class SiPixels
